name: Beat The Bogan
description:
Use the Beat The Bogans App to play along with the Beat The Bogans board game by Imagination


There are two modes within the app: player (bogan) mode and Chief Bogan mode.

BOGAN Mode:
This mode is used when you are playing rounds 1 – 3 of the board game. Multiple players can use the buzzer to buzz in with an answer during these rounds.

CHIEF BOGAN Mode:
The Chief Bogan mode can be used in all rounds. To use the app in rounds 1-3, the Chief Bogan selects from the three sound options to confirm if an answer is the top answer, correct answer or wrong answer. In the Bogan Battle Round the app can be used for a wrong answer.
